Name: Night Blood : Avenger's Tide
About the game: 'Night Blood: Avenger's Tide' is a side-scrolling action game that takes place in the world's most prosperous city, Atlandi. Players need to control Mark to find his own past, use various ultra-sci-fi weapons to break through the enemy's siege, and finally uncover the huge conspiracy hidden behind the crisis. Destroy the enemy's plot Atlandi is a super city controlled by a foundation composed of three major corporations: The Watcher, the Order Unit and Lyke. Behind the superficial prosperity is full of the dirty deeds of big corporations. As a super soldier, you will take up the weapon in your hand, fight against the dark side of the city, keep fighting and gain growth, and finally destroy all the conspiracies of the enemy. Multiple free fighting styles During the battle, you will face different types of enemies from guards, mechanical soldiers, drones, modified creatures, etc., and avoid enemy attacks by rolling, jumping, sprinting, etc., and even using weapons. Bounce the enemy's bullets and attacks, and execute the enemy in front of you with a hearty combo attack. Cyber weapons show their power Through battles again and again, you can unlock some unimaginable weapons, thermal knives, beam cannons, induction blades, prosthetic hand cannons. Each weapon has a unique fighting style. In addition, you can also unlock more weapons ability, make good use of these abilities, let you incarnate the demon of the battlefield to harvest the life of all enemies. Powerful props to help you pass the level smoothly In the battlefield, there are a variety of practical combat tactical props such as shield drones, plasma knives, sonic bombs, and electromagnetic grenades for use. As long as they are used properly, they can even solve all enemies along the way in an instant. Overcome the trap Proceed cautiously in scenes with complex terrain changes, use your abilities to avoid traps and find out the key information to the end. No matter what awaits ahead is hope or endless tribulation, only constant fighting can tell.
